title: Dunk master Nasus
body:
Dunk Master Susan 
Dunk master Illoai

We have a whole soccer team so wtf

replies.body: Dunk Master Ziggs should've happened ages ago.
Na, I say that should be Dime Dropper Ziggs
I'm a Ziggs main so I'll take whatever I'm given. And no I'm not a Ziggs main because of Ziggs bot. I'm not a meta knight.

? I don't crucify people for their reasoning on playing champs, every reason is a just reason in this game.

Besides, ziggs is a fun champion regardless of meta


His ult could be a nice animation of him shooting a flaming basketball that was a hidden bomb and have like basketball pieces spread out like shrapnel from a grenade

I know. I just feel dirty saying "I'm an x main" if x is in the meta. If you've seen the Azmodan basketball skin in Zeroes of the Storm there is 1 attack he does where he throws a basketball across the map and it lands with the swish sound you hear when a basketball goes through the net. Thats what I've always imagined them giving Ziggs. Bouncing bomb bounce sounds could sound just like a basketball being dribbled. The W and the E are a bit harder to figure out though.
